name: Youkai
desc: A group of nearly extinct supernatural beings from Inazuma.

imgDesc.text: Kamai Kenji at the Mikawa Flower Festival
A nightmare monster, Kuroyume, and a yumekui-baku, Yumemizuki Mizuki.
A tengu Sasayuri (left), oni Mikoshi Chiyo (middle), Kitsune Saiguu (right), and Raiden Ei.
A blue oni and crimson oni

customize.text: Types of youkai

The foxlike youkai. As urban legends say, they have incredible intelligence and a long-lasting memory. The kitsune have a grading system, and the most powerful are Sky Kitsune. Two steps lower are the yakan, preying upon humans. There are also Earth Kitsune. Some legends say that after Kitsune Saiguu disappeared, the mightier Sky Kitsune and Earth Kitsune turned into stone statues to await her return. As their kind slowly dwindled, the Kitsune lost their mystical might, and now no longer speak.
Yumekui-baku
Mo-shaped youkai, who can eat dreams
Oni
Youkai in the form of giants with horns. There are two types of oni: crimson and blue.

Carefree youkai, also known as tanuki. They have the ability to transform into other objects, including humans.
Tengu
Winged youkai, who often live in the mountains
Nekomata
Youkai with two tails, whose true form is a cat
Tsukumogami
Item spirits that are created from the power of the other youkai.
Nightmare monsters
Monsters, who live in the people's nightmares. They have gone extinct.
Bake-neko
Youkai who take form of young women
Mujina
Shapeshifter youkai. Adults use a legend about the Great Mujina Youkai as a scary story for children to prevent them from walking alone at night.

customize.name: Youko
customize.desc: A little youkai who wanted to revive the Mikawa Flower Festival.

customize.name: Hitotsume Kozou
customize.desc: A little youkai who tried to revive the Mikawa Flower Festival.

customize.name: Kappa
customize.desc: A little youkai who wanted to revive the Mikawa Flower Festival.

customize.text: Other youkai
Notable youkai

customize.name: Yae Miko
customize.desc: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

customize.text: A Sky kitsune, Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine, and

customize.name: Beelzebul
customize.desc: The Electro Archon of Inazuma, known as Raiden Ei.

customize.text: 's familiar from the Hakushin Clan. She is a very powerful youkai.

customize.name: Kitsune Saiguu
customize.desc: A Kitsune from the Hakushin clan, who was worshiped as a kitsune goddess. She died 500 years ago during the Cataclysm.

customize.text: A kitsune from the Hakushin Clan, who was worshiped as a kitsune goddess. She was corrupted by the Abyss during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: 500 years ago, and her memories took the form of

customize.name: Hanachirusato
customize.desc: A mysterious shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine.

customize.text:
from the filth.
Hakushin
A kitsune, matriarch of the Hakushin Clan
Urakusai
A very powerful kitsune, Daiyouko. He could possess human bodies at will and was interested in literature.

customize.name: Yumemizuki Mizuki
customize.desc: A shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse, a baku, and a clinical psychologist. Dedicated to the dispersal of nightmares, and to bringing people peace of mind.

customize.text:
A talented yumekui-baku, clinical psychologist, and shareholder of Aisa Bathhouse. She understands people's feelings better than other baku.
Hyakujitsuhaku Shion,
Shiba Murasaki
Yumekui-baku, workers of Aisa Bathhouse
Kuroyume
The last nightmare monster, who tried to revive his kind. He was stopped by Mizuki.

customize.name: Ioroi
customize.desc: A bake-danuki, who was sealed in a statue by Kamuna Harunosuke.

customize.text: The Kakushigami of the bake-danuki and the Hidden Protector of the Grove. He was Kitsune Saiguu's friend and rival. When Ioroi stole the ward needed to purify the Sacred Sakura, thinking it was an ordinary comb, along with the other bake-danuki from Chinju Forest, he was sealed into stone by

customize.name: Kamuna Harunosuke
customize.desc: The creator of the Mystic Onmyou Chamber, who lived about 500 years ago.

customize.name: "Shousei"
customize.desc: A bake-danuki from Chinju Forest.

customize.name: "Gyoubu Koban"
customize.desc: A bake-danuki from Chinju Forest.

customize.name: "Kichiboushi"
customize.desc: A little tanuki from Chinju Forest. Ioroi plans to pass the titles of "Bake-Danuki King" and "Protector of the Grove" to him.

customize.text:
Little bake-danuki from Chinju Forest
Kinkaku
Ginkaku
Tetsunosuke
Bake-danuki that were possessed by the Nightmare from the horn fragment of Mikoshi Chiyo. For 500 years, they hid and saw enemies in everyone until they were cleansed from the Abyss.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

customize.text: A crimson oni and the leader of the Arataki Gang

customize.name: Mikoshi Chiyo
customize.desc: Raiden Ei's loyal lieutenant, driven mad by the Nightmare after the Cataclysm. She was defeated by Ei.

customize.text: A crimson oni and Raiden Ei's friend. During the Cataclysm, she was corrupted by the Nightmare and attacked Ei, which resulted in her death.

customize.name: Takuya
customize.desc: A blue oni who is currently in custody after attacking people in a group of Nobushi.

customize.text:
The last blue oni
Ako Domeki
An oni, thief, and a bandit, known as the Deathless Oni of Seirai. He participated in the rebellion against the Shogun.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.text:
A nekomata and a courier for Komaniya Express
Kamai Kenji
One of the top youkai. During the

customize.name: Mikawa Flower Festival
customize.desc: The Mikawa Flower Festival is an ancient Youkai festival associated with games, fun, music, and drinks.

customize.text: he met with a mortal samurai and became his friend.

customize.name: Hanyuuda Chizuru
customize.desc: A yokai that emerged from an object and assumed a human form outside of her own body. She is a Tsukumogami.

customize.text: A tsukumogami and a spirit of a pair of hagoita, that Kamai and the samurai played in the game Akatsu Haneasobi. Awakened by Kamai's power.

customize.name: Sasayuri
customize.desc: A tengu and the general of the Inazuman army. He died in the war with Orobashi 2,000 years ago.

customize.text: A tengu, general of the Shogun's army. He died in a civil war with

customize.name: Orobashi
customize.desc: The Serpent God, who brought the people of Enkanomiya out of the Dark Sea and onto the surface. He was killed by Raiden Ei.

customize.text: 2,000 years ago.

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

customize.text: A tengu, general of the Shogun's army
Relationships

customize.name: Mikawa Flower Festival
customize.desc: The Mikawa Flower Festival is an ancient Youkai festival associated with games, fun, music, and drinks.

customize.text: An ancient youkai festival
Related Books and Items

customize.name: Tamayuratei no Ohanashi
customize.desc: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's flame. This must once have been one of its vessels.

customize.name: Toukabou Shigure
customize.desc: A rather special oil-paper umbrella. While long wanderings may make one used to the wind and the rain, there might be some fun in admiring a rainy scene beneath this parasol.

customize.name: Uraku Misugiri
customize.desc: This famous blade was once created by the hand of Urakusai, the renowned literatus. Legend has it that it has never cut any living creature in all these hundreds of years.

customize.name: Thundering Pulse
customize.desc: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.

customize.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
customize.desc: According to its previous owner, this weapon is the "Mighty Redhorn Stoic Stonethreshing Gilded Goldcrushing Lion Lord" that can send any monster packing with its tail between its legs.

customize.name: Kagura's Verity
customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.name: Hakushin Ring
customize.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

customize.name: "The Catch"
customize.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

customize.name: New Chronicles of the Six Kitsune

customize.text: Trailers and Story Teasers
Version 5.4 "Moonlight Amidst Dreams" Trailer

<color=#ffd780>January 24, 2025</color>
Life is like weaving between sweet dreams and nightmares.
When you feel tense, terrified, and unable to breathe,
Please take a moment to rest and savor the sweetness of delectable dreams.
Rip, tear, and devour your nightmares.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
"Yumemizuki Mizuki: Dining on a Dish of Dreams"

<color=#ffd780>February 6, 2025</color>
The yumekui-baku feeds on dreams.
As the fork descends, she pierces through the trapdoors you've passed, the thorns you've touched, and the tempests you've faced.
Layer by layer — until she uncovers the softest "delicacy" and presents it before you.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>
"Yumemizuki Mizuki: Don't Fear, Mizuki's Here!"

<color=#ffd780>February 11, 2025</color>
"Don't Fear, Mizuki's Here! — The show that Inazuma's youkai just can't get enough of, now airing to rave reviews!"
"Hosted by the well-traveled, knowledgeable, and gorgeous clinical psychologist, Ms. Yumemizuki, who's here to help you tackle your trickiest troubles!"
"Day or night, she'll meet you in every dream where your heart is laid bare!"
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

Tartaglia's Birthday

<color=#ffd780>July 20, 2023</color>
"Hmm? This album... must be a gift from my traveling companion."
"It's been such a long time. I wonder when we'll meet again..."
"...Teucer! Come take a look at this youkai picture book, you'll love it."
"Yay, storytime! Mr. Cyclops wants to listen too!"
"Ahaha, alright then. Let's start from the beginning..."
Kujou Sara's Birthday

<color=#ffd780>July 14, 2024</color>
Protecting the mountains and forests is the duty of the tengu. I've known the bake-danuki for a long time now.
They came here specially to celebrate my birthday. As a tengu, I must not forget my etiquette.
Here, a fresh Lavender Melon for you.
Don't worry, I've prepared five. There's enough to go around.
